room_title: Escape room "The Great American Bank Robbery" by Locked Up - Grand Rapids in Grand Rapids
room_description:
The 1930s saw the rise of great bank robbers, a group of reckless men (and women) who might have once found a career forging a pioneer trail. Left with nothing to do but vent their rage at a government and upper class that put them in a dire situation, they turned to a life of crime. While G-men worked to take them down, these public enemies blazed a trail across the American consciousness.

You and your gang of outlaws will plan to seize the largest stash of money and gold ever taken from The First National Bank of Texas!

Can you unlock the riddles and clues to get you to the stash before being caught by the diligent G-men?  Are you up for the Challenge?
